National Cheng Kung University Hospital
Department of Radiation Oncology
Radiation Treatment Summary

本院第1次放射治療

1. Name: 李XX  Age: 63 y/o  Sex: F
2. Diagnosis:
Breast Ca, left, locally advanced, cT4N1M0, cStage IIIB (ER+PR+Neu3+), s/p neoadjuvant C/T (AC*4+TH*4)[clinical response: PR], s/p left MRM, ypT1cN0M0, ypStage IA (ER+PR+Neu3+), on Herceptin maintenance & Femara, for post-MRM adjuvant R/T
3. Intent of Radiotherapy: Adjuvant, Post-op
4. Treatment Period: 20220117 - 20220303 , Elapsed days: 45
5. Radiation Fractionation Scheme:
Left supra- & infra-clavicular LNs and left internal mammary LNs: 5000 cGy/ 25 fractions/ 37 elapsed days (N, IMRT alone, CTV_H)
Left anterior chest wall: 5000 cGy/ 25 fractions/ 37 elapsed days (T, IMRT alone, CTV_L)
Left anterior chest wall scar: 6000 cGy/ 30 fractions/ 45 elapsed days (T, 2D + IMRT, CTV_H)
6. Comments:
Planned treatment completed: Yes.
R/T was completed smoothly, skin reaction: Gr.2, esophagitis: Gr.1, no other significant Gr.3 or Gr.4 adverse events. Total R/T course exceeded 6 weeks due to Chinese New Year vacation. Suggested OPD follow-up.

R / V.S. 賴OO 放腫專醫字第 000XXX 號
